name: Gaze of the Abyss
description: Gaze of the Abyss is a two-player, cooperative horror puzzle game, which places players in control of a pair of undersea explorers. With one player – a drone – controlling their view of the seafloor, and the other – a diver – moving about through the world, the two must make their way through the ruins of an old ship – without meeting the same end as its crew.
